course_description: This course is a graduate level introduction to the design and analysis of algorithms. Although we will review some undergraduate level material, we will instead emphasize reading and experimentation at a level appropriate for the initiation of research. This course will have both theoretical and practical content. As course highlights, students will be expected to implement and analyze the performance of a fundamental data structure, starting with a close reading of the original research paper.
schedule_location: TTh 1pm-2:15pm in Math & Science Center - W201
